data.name: trip=true: Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
By purchasing this DLC, you support the developers of the trip=true game.


The artbook contains:

• Character sprites in original size (3400*5000 px) and full HD (734*1080 px).
• Backgrounds (3840*2160 px).
• Several room tour pictures. You will be able to look at some rooms from different angles. (4356*2160 px).
• All CGs in original size (3840*2160 px), including NSFW CGs (3840*4000 px).
• Several images used for promo, etc.

All images are in png format.

After purchase, additional content will be located in the game folder on your computer.

data.short_description: Artbook created as DLC for the trip=true game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or lower
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Warning! This artbook contains sexual assault, self-harm and suicide! It is not recommended for people with mental health problems.
